description:
GENERAL SUMMARY
• Prepares and reviews loan documents necessary for closing commercial, mortgage and consumer loans.
• Promotes Bank’s products or services. Develops new business and customer relationships.

QUALIFICATIONS (Education and Experience)
• High School Diploma or equivalent
• Three years prior banking experience with emphasis on loan administration preferred
• Comprehensive knowledge of lending regulations
• Working knowledge of loan documents and legal requirements for perfecting various types of collateral

QUALIFICATIONS (Abilities and Skills)
• Capacity to make independent decisions
• Ability to work with minimal supervision
• Ability to maintain confidentiality
• Organized and accurate in work
• Demonstrated initiative
• Ability to prioritize and manage multiple tasks simultaneously and remain cognizant of deadlines and schedules
• Proven record for meeting deadlines
• Exceptional customer service skills and interpersonal savvy
• Ability to work well with customers, staff, attorneys, vendors, and general public.
• Proven ability to develop relationships
• Personable and professional manner
• Above average oral, written, and presentation skills
• Ability to communicate effectively with all levels of management
• Experience in a loan documentation software program, preferably LaserPro
• Computer proficiency including Word and Excel

ESSENTIAL JOB RESPONSIBILITIES
• Prepare all documents required for ratification of commercial, mortgage and consumer loans
• Process all loan related documents
• Assist Lending Officer and clients with loan closings
• Act as a liaison between VNB and legal representatives of its clients for loan matters
• Ensure collateral is secured in a timely manner
• Ability to comprehend regulatory and bank policy issues when preparing loan documents

To be considered, attach and forward resume. Criminal (state and FBI), drug, credit and employment checks will be conducted.

EOE Minorities / Females / Individuals with Disabilities / Protected Veterans

Job Type: Full-time

Benefits:
• 401(k)
• 401(k) matching
• Dental insurance
• Employee assistance program
• Employee discount
• Flexible schedule
• Flexible spending account
• Health insurance
• Health savings account
• Life insurance
• Paid time off
• Tuition reimbursement
• Vision insurance

Schedule:
• 8 hour shift
• Monday to Friday

Education:
• High school or equivalent (Required)

Experience:
• Customer service: 1 year (Required)

Work Location: In person
